package.name: ASSURINTYglobal_Magento_ESP
package.summary: Seamlessly offer extended warranty for sale in customer cart. Displays as an optional item in the cart.
package.description:
Become an ASSURINTYglobal Extended Service Contract retailer.


Seamless Integration / Additional Revenue



Adding the ASSURINTYglobal for Magento extension to your shopping cart is an easy way for you to offer a valuable protection/repair plan or extended warranty to your customer in conjunction with their purchase. The plans offer online merchants, additional high margin revenues with no associated inventory or other expense.

Our servers automatically map and provide the appropriate warranty seamlessly in the checkout cart. Your customers have the option of adding the warranty to any and all approved products.

The plug-and-play extension will automatically create the warranty product attributes in Magento for importing warranty SKUs. When your items are approved, the warranty skus are added to your inventory list. Warranty sales data is then sent to our servers for registration and a confirmation is sent to the customer.

Merchants earn their upsell profit upfront by collecting the full retail price for the warranty seamlessly as part of the sale. Merchants are then billed for the cost of the warranty at the close of the month.

Quality


Nothing is more valuable to a buyer than tangible protection. The ASSURINTYglobal Warranty Program allows merchants to give its customers the tangible protection of an affordable extended warranty program and the peace of mind that comes with it.

When you offer your customers an ASSURINTYglobal Protection/Repair plan or extended warranty, you are providing them with a top-shelf plan that is individually and fully insured by Starr Companies, a $10+ billion global insurer rated A (Excellent) by AM Best.

We offer a variety of plans for electronics, appliances, power tools, furniture, flooring, watches, jewelry and eyewear. Each category is serviced by our network of repair depots located throughout the US and Canada. For larger items covered by our in-home/on-premises repair plans, we dispatch a repair technician to the customer’s location.

Best Practices/Robust Support


The ASSURINTYglobal beta version of this extension is being offered to you as a free extension on Magento Connect for a limited time. ASSURINTYglobal for Magento was built by Classy Llama, a world-class Magneto Gold Partner to ensure user-friendliness, compliance with best practices, customization with the Magento Enterprise platform, and compliance with current standards in secure information and data transfer. You and your customers will enjoy our courteous, dedicated customer service staff and around the clock support.



More Information


If you would like to install the plugin but need additional information, please call us at (609) 616-3900 or email magento@ASSURINTYglobal.com.

We look forward to partnering with you!
package.notes: Fixed export of order email address
